attn_node.name: PAU_FIR0
attn_node.bit: NTL array CE
NTL header array UE
NTL data array UE
NTL NVLInk Control/Header/AE Parity error
NTL NVLink Data Parity error
NTL NVLink Malformed Packet (illegal Cmd encode, etc.)
NTL NVLink Unsupported Packet (receiving DGD, receiving Atomic with unsupported DatLen, etc)
NTL NVLink Config errors (Credits received > max configured)
NTL NVLink CRC errors or LMD=Stomp
NTL PRI errors (errors returned by NDL Wrapper on PRI interface)
NTL logic error (overflow, underflow, etc)
NTL LMD=Data Poison
NTL data array SUE
CQ CTL/SM ASBE Array single-bit correctable error
CQ CTL/SM PBR PowerBus Recoverable (ex: abort_trm CResp)
CQ CTL/SM REG Register ring error (ie noack)
CQ CTL/SM DUE Data Uncorrectable error for MMIO store data
CQ CTL/SM UT=1 to frozen PE (for naples this was in AT as part of the PCT lookup).
CQ CTL/SM NCF NVLink configuration error (ex: Probe missed its GPUBAR)
CQ CTL/SM NVF NVLink fatal (ex: rcv data resp to write req)
CQ CTL/SM OCR OpenCAPI Recoverable, Command failed (ex: SUE data to memory, a*_failed response to AFU, etc) and brick not fenced.
CQ CTL/SM AUE Array uncorrectable error
CQ CTL/SM PBP PowerBus parity error
CQ CTL/SM PBF PowerBus Fatal (ex: addr_error CResp)
CQ CTL/SM PBC PowerBus configuration error (ex: group > 3)
CQ CTL/SM FWD Forward-Progress (internal timer or rpt_hang.data)
CQ CTL/SM NLG PAU Logic error (ex: invalid state, missed table lookup, etc.)
Cresp=Addr_Error received for a load command (PowerBus LD_cresp_addr_error)
Cresp=Addr_Error received for a store command (PowerBus ST_cresp_addr_error)
CQ DAT ECC UE on data/BE arrays. Relevant word is marked with SUE
CQ DAT ECC CE on data/BE arrays
CQ DAT parity error on data/BE latches. Relevant word is marked with SUE
CQ DAT parity errors on configuration registers
CQ DAT parity errors on received PowerBus rtag
CQ DAT parity errors on internal state latches
CQ DAT logic error (invalid state bit patterns, credit overflow, etc.)
CQ_DAT ECC SUE on data/BE arrays that can be due to poisoned data from GPU
CQ_DAT ECC SUE on PB receive data (CANNOT be due to poisoned data from GPU)
CQ DAT Reserved, macro bit 9
CQ DAT Reserved, macro bit 10
XTS internal logic error
XTS correctable errors in XTS internal SRAM
XTS uncorrectable errors in XTS internal SRAM
XTS correctable error on incoming stack transactions
XTS uncorrectable/protocol errors on incoming stack transaction
XTS protocol errors on incoming PBUS transaction
XTS Translate Request Fail
XTS informational fir that is set when the snooper retries a rpt_hang.check or rpt_hang.poll command.
XTS Reserved, macro bit 8
XTS Reserved, macro bit 9
XTS Reserved, macro bit 10
XTS Reserved, macro bit 11
XTS Reserved, macro bit 12
XTS Reserved, macro bit 13
XTS Reserved, macro bit 14
XTS Reserved, macro bit 15
XTS Reserved, macro bit 16
XTS Reserved, macro bit 17
XTS Reserved, macro bit 18
AME Reserved, interrupt
AME data ECC UE
AME data SUE
Unused FIR
Unused FIR
